S.FORM: muisatr dra manay muka i kiyukay i Kiring?
moisatr dra manay moka i kiyokay i Kiring?
S.TRANSL: How does Kiring go to church?

S.FORM: midinsiya muka i kiyukay i Kiring.
midinsiya moka i kiyokay i Kiring.
S.TRANSL: Kiring goes to church by bicycle.

S.FORM: muisatr yu dra ciē-yun muka i takesian?
moisatr yo dra ciē-yon moka i takesian?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by MRT?

S.FORM: adri, muisatr ku dra bas muka i takesian.
adri, moisatr ko dra bas moka i takesian.
S.TRANSL: No, I go to school by bus.

S.FORM: midinsiya yu muka i takesian?
midinsiya yo moka i takesian?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by bicycle?

S.FORM: aiwa, midinsiya ku muka i takesian.
aiwa, midinsiya ko moka i takesian.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to school by bicycle.

S.FORM: muisatr yu kana pakesup na igiw muka i Takaw?
moisatr yo kana pakesop na igiw moka i Takaw?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail?

S.FORM: aiwa, muisatr ku kana pakesup na igiw muka i Takaw.
aiwa, moisatr ko kana pakesop na igiw moka i Takaw.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail.

S.FORM: muisatr yu dra igiw? adri i, dra hikuki muka i Balangaw?
moisatr yo dra igiw? adri i, dra hikoki moka i Balangaw?
S.TRANSL: 你去台東搭火車還是搭飛機？
Are you going to Taitung by train or by plane?

S.FORM: muisatr ku dra hikuki. maraarei dra igiw na hikuki.
moisatr ko dra hikoki. maraarei dra igiw na hikoki.
S.TRANSL: 我搭飛機，搭飛機比搭火車快。
I will take the plane because it is faster than the train.

S.FORM: muisatr yu dra bas? adri i, mipalidring yu muka i kiyukay?
moisatr yo dra bas? adri i, mipalidring yo moka i kiyokay?
S.TRANSL: 你去教會搭公車還是開車？
Are you going to drive to the church or take the bus?

S.FORM: mipalidring ku muka i kiyukay. marakalleayan dra bas an mipalidring ta.
mipalidring ko moka i kiyokay. marakalleayan dra bas an mipalidring ta.
S.TRANSL: 我開車去教會，開車比搭公車方便。
I will drive to the church because it is more convenient than the bus.

S.FORM: adallep i supemarekit mu ruma?
adallep i sopemarekit mo roma?
S.TRANSL: Is the market close to your house?

S.FORM: adri adallep. miutubay ku muka i supemarekit.
adri adallep. miotobay ko moka i sopemarekit.
S.TRANSL: 不近，我都騎摩托車去超市。
No, it is not, so I always ride the motorcycle to the market.

S.FORM: adallep i takesian na iyu-ci?
adallep i takesian na iyo-ci?
S.TRANSL: Is the post office close to the school?

S.FORM: adallep. kemakawang ta muka.
adallep. kemakawang ta moka.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it is within walking distance.

S.FORM: adallep i siyataw na aekaekanan?
adallep i siyataw na aekaekanan?
S.TRANSL: Is the restaurant close to the station?

S.FORM: mupatraran ta i siyataw aw kemakawang ta dra lluwatra trektrek i, meredek ta lla.
mopatraran ta i siyataw aw kemakawang ta dra llowatra trektrek i, meredek ta lla.
S.TRANSL: 出車站再走五分鐘就到了。
It only takes five minutes after you walk out of the station.

S.FORM: miwari yu an uninan?
miwari yo an oninan?
makuda amaw?
makoda amaw?
maranger ku muka kirepanauwa kanu.
maranger ko moka kirepanaowa kano.
S.TRANSL: I would like to visit you.

S.FORM: ullaya ku bangabangan aw uniyan ku i ruma an uninan. mayaa ta driya dra druma dra wari i!
ollaya ko bangabangan aw oniyan ko i roma an oninan. mayaa ta driya dra droma dra wari i!
S.TRANSL: 我今天有事不在家，改天吧！
I am out today. How about another day?

S.FORM: kaullallaya nu wari an daman? an paelipas dra karealliyan i, kaykuya mayaa kanu.
kaollallaya no wari an daman? an paelipas dra karealliyan i, kaykoya mayaa kano.
S.TRANSL: 那你明天有空嗎？我下午去找你。
Then, are you available tomorrow? I’ll visit you tomorrow afternoon.

S.FORM: aiwa. ti ngarayaw yu i ruma.
aiwa. ti ngarayaw yo i roma.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I will wait for you at home.

S.FORM: kiyumalla ku driya, karuwa ku lu-in? maranger ku temilill benilin.
kiyomalla ko driya, karowa ko lo-in? maranger ko temilill benilin.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄音嗎？我想做紀錄。
Would you mind if I do the voice recording? I would like to keep a record.

S.FORM: aiwa i! inaba kemadru!
aiwa i! inaba kemadro!
karuwa ku lu-ing?
karowa ko lo-ing?
S.TRANSL: Would you mind if I do the video recording?

S.FORM: adri ku bulay. aw adri niriwak i kubaw. aeman a!
adri ko bolay. aw adri niriwak i kobaw. aeman a!
S.TRANSL: 我不好看，倉庫也沒整理，不要啦！
No, I am plain and the warehouse hasn’t been tidied up yet.

S.FORM: ane kemadru i, semiyasiyasing ku lla.
ane kemadro i, semiyasiyasing ko lla.
S.TRANSL: Then I will just take photos.

S.FORM: adri siyasing.
adri siyasing.
karuwa ku lla kiyumall kanu. semangalan!
karowa ko lla kiyomall kano. semangalan!
S.TRANSL: Thank you for accepting the interview.

S.FORM: aiwa. kiyaumall yu dra manay?
aiwa. kiyaomall yo dra manay?
S.TRANSL: You are welcome. What would you like to know?

S.FORM: kiyumala ku driya. a llallak yu driya i, kiyakarun yu dra manay?
kiyomala ko driya. a llallak yo driya i, kiyakaron yo dra manay?
S.TRANSL: 請問您年輕時是做什麼的？
What do you do when you are young?

S.FORM: asuwa driya i, a kinsas ku. meretra ku lla garam.
asowa driya i, a kinsas ko. meretra ko lla garam.
S.TRANSL: 我以前是警察，但我現在退休了。
I was a police officer but I am retired now.

S.FORM: mikiyakarunan yu driya garem?
mikiyakaronan yo driya garem?
S.TRANSL: Then, are you working at the moment?

S.FORM: kiyakarun ku i takesian.
kiyakaron ko i takesian.
kaadru i drekall nu wallak?
kaadro i drekall no wallak?
S.TRANSL: 請問您的孩子也住在部落嗎？
Do your kids live in the tribe too?

S.FORM: adri, kaadru i tukay ku wallak.
adri, kaadro i tokay ko wallak.
S.TRANSL: 不，我的孩子在都市居住。
No, my kids are all living in the city.

S.FORM: misasa yu kikadru garem?
misasa yo kikadro garem?
S.TRANSL: Then, do you live by yourself?

S.FORM: benaaw ku dra suwan dra saya. aw dra ayam dra saya. nanku trau i sabak nadru.
benaaw ko dra sowan dra saya. aw dra ayam dra saya. nanko trao i sabak nadro.
S.TRANSL: 我還有養一隻狗和一隻鳥，他們也是我的家人。
I also keep a dog and a bird. They are my family.

S.FORM: kuyku driya. benaaw ku dra ngiyaw dra saya. ullaya ta kiyarepaillangan a garamgaman i, adri ta lla sallengseng.
koyko driya. benaaw ko dra ngiyaw dra saya. ollaya ta kiyarepaillangan a garamgaman i, adri ta lla sallengseng.
S.TRANSL: 我也有養一隻貓，有動物陪伴不會無聊。
I have a cat too. I won’t get bored with the company of my pet.

S.FORM: maranger ku kiyumall kanu dratu llegiyan dra paallupan.
maranger ko kiyomall kano drato llegiyan dra paallopan.
S.TRANSL: 我想請問你關於打獵的禁忌。
I would like to ask you about the taboos of hunting.

S.FORM: adri sadru ku kinalladraman. ti tubangaw yu kananku kinasaiguwan i!
adri sadro ko kinalladraman. ti tobangaw yo kananko kinasaigowan i!
S.TRANSL: 我知道的不多，但我能回答的都會回答你。
I don’t know much about that, but I will tell you everything I know.

S.FORM: nanemu sinadaday dra paallupan i, ullaya tu llegiyan?
nanemo sinadaday dra paallopan i, ollaya to llegiyan?
S.TRANSL: 你們打獵的武器有什麼禁忌嗎？
Do you have any taboos about hunting weapons?

S.FORM: naniyam sinadaday dra paallupan i, adri karuwa semegiw a babayan.
naniyam sinadaday dra paallopan i, adri karowa semegiw a babayan.
S.TRANSL: 我們打獵的武器不可以讓女生碰到。
Our hunting weapons are untouchable to women.

S.FORM: karuwa kurenang muka paallupa a babayan?
karowa korenang moka paallopa a babayan?
S.TRANSL: 那女人可以一起去打獵嗎？
Then, can women go hunting together?

S.FORM: adri! adri karuwa muka paallupa a babayan.
adri! adri karowa moka paallopa a babayan.
S.TRANSL: 不行！女人也不可以打獵。
No, women cannot go hunting either.

S.FORM: Kusiyang, uniyan lla dra eraw kanta. uwa driya trima dra eraw!
Kosiyang, oniyan lla dra eraw kanta. owa driya trima dra eraw!
S.TRANSL: Kusiyang，家裡沒有米酒了，你去買米酒。
Kusiyang, our home is out of rice wine, please go and buy some.

S.FORM: ullaya driya a sadalillan i sawka. aeman na tremima i!
ollaya driya a sadalillan i sawka. aeman na tremima i!
S.TRANSL: 廚房裡還有一瓶，不用買吧！
There is still one bottle left in the kitchen, so there is no need to buy one!

S.FORM: sangeut na sadalillan. uwa driya trima dra druwaya dalill.
sangeot na sadalillan. owa driya trima dra drowaya dalill.
S.TRANSL: 一瓶不夠，再去買兩瓶回來。
One bottle is not enough for me, go and buy two more back.

S.FORM: tratrima ku dra eraw. menaniwan mu dra eraw?
tratrima ko dra eraw. menaniwan mo dra eraw?
S.TRANSL: 我要買米酒，你們有賣嗎？
I am looking for rice wine. Do you have any rice wine?

S.FORM: ullaya a! tratrima yu dra munuma?
ollaya a! tratrima yo dra monoma?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How many bottles do you need?

S.FORM: tratrima ku dra druwaya dalill. aw tratrima ku driya dra salubukan dra beras.
tratrima ko dra drowaya dalill. aw tratrima ko driya dra salobokan dra beras.
S.TRANSL: 我要買兩瓶，還要買一包米。
I want two bottles and a pack of rice.

S.FORM: ullaya kadrini na beras. kiyaami yu driya dra manay?
ollaya kadrini na beras. kiyaami yo driya dra manay?
S.TRANSL: 米在這裡，你還需要什麼嗎?
Here is the rice, what else do you need?

S.FORM: tratrima ku driya dra bitrenun. ullaya?
tratrima ko driya dra bitrenon. ollaya?
S.TRANSL: I want some eggs too, do you have some?

S.FORM: niwananay lla peniya na bitrenun.
niwananay lla peniya na bitrenon.
tratrima ku dra kiruwan.
tratrima ko dra kirowan.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: maranger yu tremima kana kemudakuda na kiruwan?
maranger yo tremima kana kemodakoda na kirowan?
S.TRANSL: What kind of clothes do you like?

S.FORM: tratrima ku kana lliketri tu asell na kiruwan.
tratrima ko kana lliketri to asell na kirowan.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy the clothes with short sleeves.

S.FORM: inaba idrini na midrarang?
inaba idrini na midrarang?
ullaya driya a druma tu edad?
ollaya driya a droma to edad?
ullaya driya a bulenan aw a tremangiya.
ollaya driya a bolenan aw a tremangiya.
S.TRANSL: We have white and blue ones too.

S.FORM: berayi ku dra saya kana tremangiya na kiruwan!
berayi ko dra saya kana tremangiya na kirowan!
S.TRANSL: 請給我一件藍色的衣服。
Please give me the clothes in blue.

S.FORM: Kusiyang, muka yu isuwa a garemay? muka yu merenarenadra?
Kosiyang, moka yo isowa a garemay? moka yo merenarenadra?
S.TRANSL: Kusiyang你剛剛去哪裡了？你去運動嗎？
Kusiyang, where have you been just now? Did you go exercising?

S.FORM: adri a! muka ku pullanga kan emu na babayan tremimaa dra kulang.
adri a! moka ko pollanga kan emo na babayan tremimaa dra kolang.
S.TRANSL: No, I went grocery shopping for my grandma.

S.FORM: a kemadri! piyawari yu an karaub? kuwarenang yu kanku muka mekana?
a kemadri! piyawari yo an karaob? kowarenang yo kanko moka mekana?
S.TRANSL: 這樣啊！你晚上有沒有空？要不要和我一起吃飯？
No wonder! Are you available at night? Would you like to have a meal with me?

S.FORM: adri ku pakaauka! auka ku tremimaa dra kiruwan.
adri ko pakaaoka! aoka ko tremimaa dra kirowan.
S.TRANSL: No, I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: an kemadru i, kurenanga ku kanu muka i!
an kemadro i, korenanga ko kano moka i!
S.TRANSL: Then, I will go with you.

S.FORM: inabayan! kiyumalla ku driya. munuma paisu idri na satenges na kulang?
inabayan! kiyomalla ko driya. monoma paiso idri na satenges na kolang?
S.TRANSL: 你好，請問這把菜多少錢？
Hello, how much is this bunch of vegetables?

S.FORM: makabetraan paisu na satenges na kulang.
makabetraan paiso na satenges na kolang.
S.TRANSL: The vegetables are $20 for a bunch.

S.FORM: munuma paisu idri na bunga?
monoma paiso idri na bonga?
S.TRANSL: How much are these sweet potatoes?

S.FORM: makatelun paisu na satintin na bunga.
makatelon paiso na satintin na bonga.
berayi ku dra druwaya tenges dra kulang aw dra satintin dra bunga.
berayi ko dra drowaya tenges dra kolang aw dra satintin dra bonga.
S.TRANSL: 請給我兩把菜和一斤地瓜。
Please give me two bunches of vegetables and a pound of sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: Kiyama, abalu ku kemasu dra tratruri. karuwa yu pabulas kanku?
Kiyama, abalo ko kemaso dra tratrori. karowa yo pabolas kanko?
S.TRANSL: Kiyama，我忘了帶筆，你可以借我嗎？
Kiyama, I forgot to bring my pen. Can you lend me one?

S.FORM: uniyan nanku. nantaw kan Panay idrini.
oniyan nanko. nantaw kan Panay idrini.
S.TRANSL: I don’t have one either. This is Panay’s.

S.FORM: karuwa yu pabulas kanku dra palamu? an garemay i, ti parebeliyasanay lla kanu.
karowa yo pabolas kanko dra palamo? an garemay i, ti parebeliyasanay lla kano.
S.TRANSL: 那可以借我一下子嗎？我很快就還你。
Can you lend me the pen for a second? I will return to you immediately.

S.FORM: aiwa. alaku!
aiwa. alako!
semangalan! semangalan kayu lla i Panay.
semangalan! semangalan kayo lla i Panay.
S.TRANSL: Thank you and thank Panay for me.

S.FORM: kiyaami yu dra manay?
kiyaami yo dra manay?
parebabeliyas ku kandri na druwaya etib na tilin.
parebabeliyas ko kandri na drowaya etib na tilin.
S.TRANSL: I want to return these two books.

S.FORM: aiwa. a manay driya nu kiyaamiyan?
aiwa. a manay driya no kiyaamiyan?
S.TRANSL: No problem and what else do you need?

S.FORM: kiyabulas ku driya kanadri na tuluwa etib na tilin.
kiyabolas ko driya kanadri na tolowa etib na tilin.
S.TRANSL: I would like to borrow these three books.

S.FORM: inaba lla. an pukatelu wariyan i, adri kaabalu druwa parebeliyasa.
inaba lla. an pokatelo wariyan i, adri kaabalo drowa parebeliyasa.
S.TRANSL: 好了。記得三天後要拿來還。
Sure and remember to return them after three days.

S.FORM: adri driya nu parebeliyasan kanku na iyasaus.
adri driya no parebeliyasan kanko na iyasaos.
S.TRANSL: You haven’t returned me the eraser.

S.FORM: ku parebeliyasan lla a daman.
ko parebeliyasan lla a daman.
daw uniyan ku iyasaus?
daw oniyan ko iyasaos?
S.TRANSL: 那我的橡皮擦怎麼不見了？
Then, why is my eraser missing?

S.FORM: nu pabulasnay kan Kiyama nay?
no pabolasnay kan Kiyama nay?
S.TRANSL: Did you lend it to Kiyama?

S.FORM: maulid ku i! kayku driya kiyumalla kantaw.
maolid ko i! kayko driya kiyomalla kantaw.
S.TRANSL: 我不知道耶！我去問問她。
I don’t know. I will go and ask her.

S.FORM: ti pabulasay yu driya kananku iyasaus.
ti pabolasay yo driya kananko iyasaos.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser first.

S.FORM: Panay, tu pinabulasan kan Kiyama idri na patratreell kanu?
Panay, to pinabolasan kan Kiyama idri na patratreell kano?
S.TRANSL: Panay, did Kiyama lend you this coat?

S.FORM: amelli, tu trinimaan kan nanalli idrini.
amelli, to trinimaan kan nanalli idrini.
S.TRANSL: 不是，這是我媽媽買給我的。
No, my mom bought it for me.

S.FORM: mararisan kantu patratreell kan Kiyama.
mararisan kanto patratreell kan Kiyama.
S.TRANSL: Kiyama’s coat is the same as yours.

S.FORM: a udreudrem tu patratreelr. adri marisan naniyam edad.
a odreodrem to patratreelr. adri marisan naniyam edad.
S.TRANSL: 他的外套是黑色的，我們的顏色不一樣。
His coat is black, so our colors are different.

S.FORM: Panay, kibulas yu dra paisu kan Kiyama?
Panay, kibolas yo dra paiso kan Kiyama?
S.TRANSL: Panay, did you borrow money from Kiyama?

S.FORM: aiwa. panaan i, parebabeliyas ku kantaw garem kema ku i, abalu ku kemasu dra paisu.
aiwa. panaan i, parebabeliyas ko kantaw garem kema ko i, abalo ko kemaso dra paiso.
S.TRANSL: 有，我本來今天要還他，我忘記帶錢了。
Yes, I was supposed to return to him today, but I forgot to bring the money.

S.FORM: an asuwa i, nu parebabeliyasan lla?
an asowa i, no parebabeliyasan lla?
S.TRANSL: Then, when will you return the money?

S.FORM: an daman i, ku parebabeliyasan kantaw lla.
an daman i, ko parebabeliyasan kantaw lla.
S.TRANSL: I will return to him tomorrow.

S.FORM: aiwa. ti rengayaw lla i Kiyama.
aiwa. ti rengayaw lla i Kiyama.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I will tell Kiyama for you.

S.FORM: na kulabaw i, ta petriray kana petrir na tratreellan dra barasa. na tikuras i, ta petriray kana petrir na sawail. an kemadri i, penauwa.
na kolabaw i, ta petriray kana petrir na tratreellan dra barasa. na tikoras i, ta petriray kana petrir na sawail. an kemadri i, penaowa.
S.TRANSL: 老鼠應該要⽤⽯壓式陷阱抓，⽵雞應該要⽤套頸式陷阱抓，這樣才對。
It is correct to catch mice through rangay and catch bamboo partridges through qjiulang.

S.FORM: aiwa. a kemadrini. pamelli ku i! driyama, adri ku miyatiyu.
aiwa. a kemadrini. pamelli ko i! driyama, adri ko miyatiyo.
S.TRANSL: 原來是這樣，我都搞錯了！難怪我都抓不到。
No wonder! I am mistaken and that’s why I cannot catch any of them.

S.FORM: ti paladamaw yu kemudakuda ta demaway kandri na druwaya na petrir.
ti paladamaw yo kemodakoda ta demaway kandri na drowaya na petrir.
S.TRANSL: 那我再教你怎麼製作這兩種陷阱。
Then I will teach you how to set up these two traps.

S.FORM: wa dra inaba i! an kemadrini i likudran i, piyatiyu ku lla dra rawa.
wa dra inaba i! an kemadrini i likodran i, piyatiyo ko lla dra rawa.
S.TRANSL: 好啊！太棒了！這樣我以後就會抓到獵物了。
Great! I will be able to catch the prey in the future.

S.FORM: asatr lla dradru na tralun i uma. uwa alaku na kawkaw i kubaw. kayta i uma.
asatr lla dradro na tralon i oma. owa alako na kawkaw i kobaw. kayta i oma.
S.TRANSL: 田裡的草太長了，你去倉庫拿鐮刀，我們去田裡。
The grass in the fields is too tall. Go to the warehouse to take the sickle and let’s go to the fields.

S.FORM: niretra isuwa na kawkaw?
niretra isowa na kawkaw?
ullaya kana kamuu i saninin. an musabak yu i kubaw i, nanau yu.
ollaya kana kamoo i saninin. an mosabak yo i kobaw i, nanao yo.
S.TRANSL: 在圓簍的旁邊，你進去倉庫就會看到了。
It is next to the round basket. You will see it when you enter the warehouse.

S.FORM: taranapaw an demikes yu! adri kababuli! salaw idangan na kawkaw.
taranapaw an demikes yo! adri kababoli! salaw idangan na kawkaw.
S.TRANSL: 小心拿！不要受傷。鐮刀很利。
Be careful and don’t get hurt. The sickle is very sharp.

S.FORM: adri dadeelli ku petrir!
adri dadeelli ko petrir!
ullaya isuwa nu petrir?
ollaya isowa no petrir?
ullaya kana kawi i makadare ku petrir.
ollaya kana kawi i makadare ko petrir.
S.TRANSL: 我的陷阱在那棵樹的下面。
My trap is under that tree.

S.FORM: daw adri yu abalu?
daw adri yo abalo?
ku pudrungay kadrini. aw malladram ku dra ullaya isuwa ku petrir.
ko podrongay kadrini. aw malladram ko dra ollaya isowa ko petrir.
S.TRANSL: 我在這邊有做記號，我知道我的陷阱在哪裡。
I make a mark here, so I know where my trap is.

S.FORM: a buebu idri. ta retraanay i inayan kiyakuraw.
a boebo idri. ta retraanay i inayan kiyakoraw.
S.TRANSL: 這是魚筌，我們放在溪邊捕魚。
This is a fish trap which we put beside the river for fishing.

S.FORM: kaniyam kadriyu i, uniyan mi dra buebu. mipangasipan mi pangasip dra kuraw.
kaniyam kadriyo i, oniyan mi dra boebo. mipangasipan mi pangasip dra koraw.
S.TRANSL: 我們那邊沒有魚筌，我們都用釣竿抓魚。
We don’t have any fish traps there, so we catch fish with a fishing rod.

S.FORM: adri ku driya temallam mipangasipan. an masall lla i, paladamu ku maw?
adri ko driya temallam mipangasipan. an masall lla i, paladamo ko maw?
S.TRANSL: 我沒有用過釣竿，你下次教我好嗎？
I have never used a fishing rod before, would you mind teaching me next time?

S.FORM: aiwa i! an masall lla i, sallangana ta muka pangasipa.
aiwa i! an masall lla i, sallangana ta moka pangasipa.
S.TRANSL: 好啊！我們下次一起去釣魚。
Sure! Let’s go fishing together next time.

S.FORM: an masall lla i, ti paladamaw yu demaway dra buebu.
an masall lla i, ti paladamaw yo demaway dra boebo.
S.TRANSL: I will teach you how to make a fish trap next time.

S.FORM: magingaging nu pangasipan. alla mutiyu a kuraw maku! kamelamui kemedreng!
magingaging no pangasipan. alla motiyo a koraw mako! kamelamoi kemedreng!
S.TRANSL: 你的釣竿動了，是不是有魚上鉤了！你快拉起來！
Your fishing rod is moving. Isn’t the fish on the hook? Pull it up!

S.FORM: kadranga driya! magiyangaging na tamina. kadruwa ku kadri kemedreng kana pangasipan. uwa kadriyu alakan ku dra tabukull.
kadranga driya! magiyangaging na tamina. kadrowa ko kadri kemedreng kana pangasipan. owa kadriyo alakan ko dra tabokoll.
S.TRANSL: 等等，船太晃了。我在這邊拉釣竿，你去那邊幫我拿網子來。
Wait, the ship is rolling heavily. I am here to pull the fishing rod and you should go there to grab me the net.

S.FORM: kedrengu kanku kadri na kuraw! ti pullangay yu kemedreng.
kedrengo kanko kadri na koraw! ti pollangay yo kemedreng.
S.TRANSL: 你把魚拉到我這邊！我幫你拉起來。
Pull the fish to my side and I will help you pull it up.

S.FORM: iuwa dra inaba i! sadru ta kuraw. matemuy ta karisis.
iowa dra inaba i! sadro ta koraw. matemoy ta karisis.
S.TRANSL: 太好了！今天大豐收，魚簍都裝滿了。
Great! It is a bumper crop today with full fish baskets.

S.FORM: kamelamuwa ta muruma aw pasiyawa ta dra nirumaenan.
kamelamowa ta moroma aw pasiyawa ta dra niromaenan.
S.TRANSL: 我們快回去和大家分享。
Let’s go back immediately and share it with everyone.

S.FORM: maylralra na sinsi.
maylralra na sinsi.
adri kalalinay lra! kamelamu uwa katengadraw kanu katatengadrawan!
adri kalalinay lra! kamelamo owa katengadraw kano katatengadrawan!
S.TRANSL: 不要再玩了！快坐在座位上！
Stop playing and quickly sit in your seat.

S.FORM: igelayan! puwari ku lra.
igelayan! powari ko lra.
kamelamu usabak!
kamelamo osabak!
karesasama na wari garem kana saliyusan?
karesasama na wari garem kana saliyosan?
liyusan lima kana saliyusan garem, sasede ta an daman, salrangana ta muka malinaya!
liyosan lima kana saliyosan garem, sasede ta an daman, salrangana ta moka malinaya!
S.TRANSL: 今天星期五，明天放假，一起出去玩吧！
It’s Friday today, we have a day off tomorrow. Let’s go out and play together!

S.FORM: aiwa i! kayta i kabalawasan.
aiwa i! kayta i kabalawasan.
S.TRANSL: Great! Let’s go to the riverside.

S.FORM: karesasama na wari an daman kana saliyusan?
karesasama na wari an daman kana saliyosan?
S.TRANSL: What day will it be tomorrow?

S.FORM: liyusan telu kana saliyusan an daman, an paelipas dra karealriyan an daman i kayta malinaya dra mali!
liyosan telo kana saliyosan an daman, an paelipas dra karealriyan an daman i kayta malinaya dra mali!
S.TRANSL: 明天星期三，我們明天下午去玩球吧！
Tomorrow will be Wednesday. Let’s go play ball tomorrow afternoon!

S.FORM: kakakuda yu an daman dra semaluwan?
kakakoda yo an daman dra semalowan?
S.TRANSL: What will you be doing tomorrow morning?

S.FORM: kasedean dra saliyusan an daman, pararenang mi kan nanalri muka i kiyukay.
kasedean dra saliyosan an daman, pararenang mi kan nanalri moka i kiyokay.
S.TRANSL: 明天是星期日，我要和媽媽去教會。
Tomorrow will be Sunday, I will be going to church with my mom.

S.FORM: kudrama yu?
kodrama yo?
delalu ku, auka ku i puwatraiyan.
delalo ko, aoka ko i powatraiyan.
S.TRANSL: I feel like vomiting. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: malupaw ku.
malopaw ko.
pikakupu temalaulep.
pikakopo temalaolep.
sinsi, nana ku tiyalr, auka ku i puwatraiyan.
sinsi, nana ko tiyalr, aoka ko i powatraiyan.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我肚子痛，要去廁所。
Teacher, I have a stomachache. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: aiwa, kamelamu muka!
aiwa, kamelamo moka!
karuwa ku muka semabesaba dra lima?
karowa ko moka semabesaba dra lima?
S.TRANSL: May I go wash my hands?

S.FORM: adalrep ta lra temalaulep temakesi, uwa lra an garemay.
adalrep ta lra temalaolep temakesi, owa lra an garemay.
S.TRANSL: It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: sinsi, nana ku tranguru, sasede ku an paelipas dra karealriyan.
sinsi, nana ko trangoro, sasede ko an paelipas dra karealriyan.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我頭好痛，下午要請假。
It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: aiwa, an uwaruma yu i taranapaw i dalan!
aiwa, an owaroma yo i taranapaw i dalan!
S.TRANSL: Okay, take care and go home.

S.FORM: sinsi, an masalr dra liyusan sa i sasede ku, auka ku kinauwa dra ising.
sinsi, an masalr dra liyosan sa i sasede ko, aoka ko kinaowa dra ising.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我下禮拜一要請假，我要去看醫生。
Teacher, I need to take a sick leave next Monday. I have to see a doctor.

S.FORM: aiwa, kasalikesiku nu dradrek!
aiwa, kasalikesiko no dradrek!
ulraya isuwa i Muya?
olraya isowa i Moya?
nana tu tiyalr, ulraya i puwatraiyan.
nana to tiyalr, olraya i powatraiyan.
S.TRANSL: She has a stomachache. She’s in the restroom.

S.FORM: ulraya isuwa i Kunas?
olraya isowa i Konas?
sinsi, nana tu takulaw kan Kunas, semede garem.
sinsi, nana to takolaw kan Konas, semede garem.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, Kunas has a sore throat. She took a sick leave today.

S.FORM: daw adri druwa i Muya?
daw adri drowa i Moya?
bias tu dradrek.
bias to dradrek.
rengay driya dra i manay kakuwa ta kanu.
rengay driya dra i manay kakowa ta kano.
i Uking Tatiyam ku ngalad, muketrep ku ami garem.
i Uking Tatiyam ko ngalad, moketrep ko ami garem.
S.TRANSL: 我叫 Uking Tatiyam，我今年10歲。
My name is Uking Tatiyam, and I’m 10 years old.

S.FORM: i manay nu ngalad?
i manay no ngalad?
i Uking Tatiyam ku ngalad.
i Uking Tatiyam ko ngalad.
a walrak yu kana isuwa na maunan?
a walrak yo kana isowa na maonan?
S.TRANSL: What ethnic group are you from?

S.FORM: a walrak ku dra Pinuyumayan.
a walrak ko dra Pinoyomayan.
a Inanuwayan peniya mu trau i sabak?
a Inanowayan peniya mo trao i sabak?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎？
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: aiwa, a Pinuyumayan mi sarumaenan.
aiwa, a Pinoyomayan mi saromaenan.
S.TRANSL: 是的，我們全家都是卑南族人。
Yes, my whole family is Pinuyumayan.

S.FORM: a Inanuwayan peniya mu trau i sabak?
a Inanowayan peniya mo trao i sabak?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎？
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: amelri, a Pinuyumayan i namalri, a Pairang i nanalri.
amelri, a Pinoyomayan i namalri, a Pairang i nanalri.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我的爸爸是卑南族，我的媽媽是漢人。
No, my father is Pinuyumayan, and my mother is Han Taiwanese.

S.FORM: tu walrak yu kan manay?
to walrak yo kan manay?
tu walrak ku kan Sakay Tatiyam.
to walrak ko kan Sakay Tatiyam.
i temama idriyu? munuma lra tu ami?
i temama idriyo? monoma lra to ami?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎？他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: makanemen lra tu ami.
makanemen lra to ami.
i temama idriyu? munuma lra tu ami?
i temama idriyo? monoma lra to ami?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: amelri, naniyam maaidrangan i drekalr taytaw, makawalu lra tu ami.
amelri, naniyam maaidrangan i drekalr taytaw, makawalo lra to ami.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我們部落的耆老，他80歲了。
No, he is an elder of our tribe. He is 80 years old.

S.FORM: munuma lra tu ami kan bau na mainayan?
monoma lra to ami kan bao na mainayan?
muketrep misama dra waluwa tu ami kan baelri na mainayan.
moketrep misama dra walowa to ami kan baelri na mainayan.
maramaidrang kanu dra sadru i bau na mainayan?
maramaidrang kano dra sadro i bao na mainayan?
S.TRANSL: 你哥哥年紀比你大很多嗎？
Is your brother much older than you?

S.FORM: kasedean mi dra lruwatra ami.
kasedean mi dra lrowatra ami.
munuma nu ikaasatr?
monoma no ikaasatr?
saleman misama dra makapetelr sekiyan ku ikaasatr.
saleman misama dra makapetelr sekiyan ko ikaasatr.
paetreng ta lra adri marepanau, asatr yu lra?
paetreng ta lra adri marepanao, asatr yo lra?
S.TRANSL: 好久不見，你是不是長高了？
I haven’t seen you in a while. Have you grown taller?

S.FORM: aiwa a! saleman miasma dra makatelun sekiyan ku ikaasatr.
aiwa a! saleman miasma dra makatelon sekiyan ko ikaasatr.
ulane yu lra?
olane yo lra?
adri, pamelri nu ninauwan!
adri, pamelri no ninaowan!
idriidriwan yu lra?
idriidriwan yo lra?
adri, ulane ku lra.
adri, olane ko lra.
ulane yu lra?
olane yo lra?
aiwa, makatelun kilo ku lra garem.
aiwa, makatelon kilo ko lra garem.
auka yu isuwa?
aoka yo isowa?
auka ku i pan-kung-se mayaa kana sinsi.
aoka ko i pan-kong-se mayaa kana sinsi.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to the office to see the teacher.

S.FORM: auka isuwa i Kusiyang?
aoka isowa i Kosiyang?
auka matelra dra ubeubel taytaw.
aoka matelra dra obeobel taytaw.
S.TRANSL: He’s going to throw away the trash.

S.FORM: ulraya isuwa i Kusiyang?
olraya isowa i Kosiyang?
ulraya kana danaw dra lralranguyan, auka kurenanga kana marepaukauka dra melranguy an garemay.
olraya kana danaw dra lralrangoyan, aoka korenanga kana marepaokaoka dra melrangoy an garemay.
S.TRANSL: 他在游泳池，他等一下要比賽游泳。
He’s at the swimming pool. He’s going to compete in a swimming competition later.

S.FORM: ulraya isuwa i Nawinaw? auka kana maariari dra kabekas an garemay taytaw.
olraya isowa i Nawinaw? aoka kana maariari dra kabekas an garemay taytaw.
S.TRANSL: Nawinaw在哪裡？她等一下要比賽跑步。
Where is Nawinaw? She’s going to compete in a running competition later.

S.FORM: ulraya kana uwakasayan maradruk, kayku mayaa kantaw.
olraya kana owakasayan maradrok, kayko mayaa kantaw.
S.TRANSL: She’s in the auditorium. I’ll go call her.

S.FORM: salrangana ta muka i renarenadran i!
salrangana ta moka i renarenadran i!
S.TRANSL: Let’s go to the playground together.

S.FORM: kayku driya tremimaa dra karealriyan, an garemay i muka ku lra mayaa kanu.
kayko driya tremimaa dra karealriyan, an garemay i moka ko lra mayaa kano.
S.TRANSL: 我先去買午餐，等一下去找你。
I’ll go buy lunch first, and then I’ll meet you later.

S.FORM: marenanga ta muka madrasa kana tabutabu i!
marenanga ta moka madrasa kana tabotabo i!
S.TRANSL: Let’s carry the lunch boxes together!

S.FORM: uwa aya dra druma dra trau, auka ku mayaa kana sinsi.
owa aya dra droma dra trao, aoka ko mayaa kana sinsi.
S.TRANSL: 你找別人，我要去找老師。
You find someone else, I’m going to find the teacher.

S.FORM: i Isaw i auka kurenanga kana merepaukauka dra kurukēt an uninan?
i Isaw i aoka korenanga kana merepaokaoka dra korokēt an oninan?
S.TRANSL: Is Isawco mpeting in croquet today?

S.FORM: adri, auka kurenanga kana merepaukauka dra paselekaw dratu ikaasatr.
adri, aoka korenanga kana merepaokaoka dra paselekaw drato ikaasatr.
S.TRANSL: No, he’s competing in high jump.

S.FORM: an marepaukauka dra rarenadran kana wari i kuwarenang yu dra marepaukauka?
an marepaokaoka dra rarenadran kana wari i kowarenang yo dra marepaokaoka?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎？
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: aiwa i! auka ku kurenanga kana maariari dra kabekas.
aiwa i! aoka ko korenanga kana maariari dra kabekas.
an marepaukauka dra rarenadran kana wari i kuwarenang yu dra marepaukauka?
an marepaokaoka dra rarenadran kana wari i kowarenang yo dra marepaokaoka?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎？
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: auka ku kurenanga kana merepaukauka dra kurukēt.
aoka ko korenanga kana merepaokaoka dra korokēt.
an marepaukauka dra rarenadran kandru na wari i kakakuda ta?
an marepaokaoka dra rarenadran kandro na wari i kakakoda ta?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會那天要做甚麼？
What will we do in the sports day?

S.FORM: auka ta kurenanga kana merepaukauka dra makedrekedreng dra tuwasu.
aoka ta korenanga kana merepaokaoka dra makedrekedreng dra towaso.
S.TRANSL: We will compete in tug of war.

S.FORM: naniwan ta dra aekanan an marepaukauka dra rarenadran?
naniwan ta dra aekanan an marepaokaoka dra rarenadran?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會要賣食物嗎？
Will we sell food at the sports day?

S.FORM: adri, naniwan ta dra tabululr.
adri, naniwan ta dra tabololr.
mualak yu dra asanga! makeser yu i!
moalak yo dra asanga! makeser yo i!
S.TRANSL: 你獲得了第一名耶！真是厲害！
Congratulations on getting first place! You’re amazing!

S.FORM: semangalan!
semangalan!
ulraya i emu na babayan i ruma?
olraya i emo na babayan i roma?
ulraya, ulraya i kiyaedrengan alrupe.
olraya, olraya i kiyaedrengan alrope.
S.TRANSL: Yes, she’s sleeping in her room.

S.FORM: ulraya i emu na babayan i ruma?
olraya i emo na babayan i roma?
uniyan, mupatraran a garemay. uwaruma an aremeng lra.
oniyan, mopatraran a garemay. owaroma an aremeng lra.
S.TRANSL: 不在，她剛出去了，要晚上才回家。
No, she’s not. She just went out and will be back in the evening.

S.FORM: ulraya i emu na mainayan i ruma?
olraya i emo na mainayan i roma?
ulraya kana pukadruwa tadrar. uwa ayau i makasatr.
olraya kana pokadrowa tadrar. owa ayao i makasatr.
S.TRANSL: 他在二樓，你上去找他吧！
He’s upstairs. You can go up and find him.

S.FORM: ulraya a trau i ruma?
olraya a trao i roma?
i Minuru a! paetreng ku lra adri menau kanu. inaba yu driya?
i Minoro a! paetreng ko lra adri menao kano. inaba yo driya?
S.TRANSL: 是Minuru啊！很久沒有看到你了，你好嗎？
It’s Minuru. I haven’t seen you in a while! How have you been?

S.FORM: aiwa! inaba ku driya! druwa ku mayaa kanu madradrayara.
aiwa! inaba ko driya! drowa ko mayaa kano madradrayara.
S.TRANSL: 是啊！我很好！我來找你聊天。
I’m doing great! I came to chat with you.

S.FORM: ulraya isuwa i temama?
olraya isowa i temama?
ulraya i sawka meriyangering dra irupan. kayku rengayaw i namalri.
olraya i sawka meriyangering dra iropan. kayko rengayaw i namalri.
S.TRANSL: 他在廚房炒菜，我去叫(告訴)爸爸。
He’s in the kitchen cooking. Let me go call him.

S.FORM: muka isuwa i Tiwa?
moka isowa i Tiwa?
muka i puwaterekukan dremimutra dra terekuk.
moka i powaterekokan dremimotra dra terekok.
S.TRANSL: She went to the chicken coop to catch chickens.

S.FORM: emu, druwa mi lra.
emo, drowa mi lra.
uniyan i temuu na mainayan. muka i uma. ngarayu driya i ruma i!
oniyan i temoo na mainayan. moka i oma. ngarayo driya i roma i!
S.TRANSL: 你們的爺爺不在家，他去田裡，你們在家等他吧！
Your grandfather is not at home. He’s in the field. Wait for him to come back.

S.FORM: ina, druwa yu lra!
ina, drowa yo lra!
paetreng ta lra adri menau kanu. asatr yu lra.
paetreng ta lra adri menao kano. asatr yo lra.
S.TRANSL: I haven’t seen you in a while. You’ve grown taller.

S.FORM: salaw ta semangal dranu iyadruwa!
salaw ta semangal drano iyadrowa!
S.TRANSL: It’s so good to see you.

S.FORM: a baberay kanemu idri na pangudralr. retraan i palralritekan.
a baberay kanemo idri na pangodralr. retraan i palralritekan.
S.TRANSL: 這是給你們的鳳梨，要放到冰箱裡。
Here’s a pineapple for you. Put it in the refrigerator.

S.FORM: paetreng yu lra adri druwa. mukasaya ta mekan i!
paetreng yo lra adri drowa. mokasaya ta mekan i!
S.TRANSL: 這麼久沒來，跟大家一起來吃飯吧！
It’s been a while. Let’s have a meal together.

S.FORM: adri kabangabang. tremekela ku dra kulisapa. kayta i kalawalawayan madradrayara.
adri kabangabang. tremekela ko dra kolisapa. kayta i kalawalawayan madradrayara.
S.TRANSL: 不用麻煩了，我喝茶就好，我們來客廳聊天。
No need to bother. I’ll just have tea. Let’s sit in the living room and chat.

S.FORM: semangalan dramu iyalubis. uwaburek ku lra.
semangalan dramo iyalobis. owaborek ko lra.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝你們的招待，我要回去了。
Thank you for your hospitality. I have to go now.

S.FORM: a trinuwak a garemay idri na terekuk. kasuyu muruma! patawari lra mekan.
a trinowak a garemay idri na terekok. kasoyo moroma! patawari lra mekan.
S.TRANSL: 這隻雞剛殺好，你帶回去慢慢吃。
This chicken was just freshly killed. Take it home and enjoy it slowly.

S.FORM: an paelipas dra karealriyan an daman i, marepanauwa ta maw?
an paelipas dra karealriyan an daman i, marepanaowa ta maw?
S.TRANSL: 我和您約明天下午好嗎？
Can I make an appointment with you tomorrow afternoon?

S.FORM: aiwa, marepanau ta isuwa?
aiwa, marepanao ta isowa?
marepanauwa ta i takesian i? aru lalu-ing ta.
marepanaowa ta i takesian i? aro lalo-ing ta.
S.TRANSL: 我們約學校好嗎？我們要錄影。
How about meeting at school? We need to shoot a video.

S.FORM: inaba an muka ta i palakuwan. piakiruwan ku dra bulretrenganan muka.
inaba an moka ta i palakowan. piakirowan ko dra bolretrenganan moka.
S.TRANSL: 那去聚會所好了，我會穿族服去。
Then let’s go to the community center. I’ll wear folk costume.

S.FORM: an miaputr na sakura kaniyam drekalr i, salaw bulay! an mubaba lra i, alamu lra kaniyam!
an miapotr na sakora kaniyam drekalr i, salaw bolay! an mobaba lra i, alamo lra kaniyam!
S.TRANSL: 我們部落的櫻花盛開很漂亮。等花開的時候你來我家吧！
The cherry blossoms in our tribe are beautiful when they bloom. Come find me when the flowers bloom!

S.FORM: ngangara ku palru dra kaseberan lra. paetreng lra dradru!
ngangara ko palro dra kaseberan lra. paetreng lra dradro!
S.TRANSL: 那要等到春天，太晚(久)了吧！
That would have to wait until spring. It’s too late, isn’t it?

S.FORM: an mangayaw i, alamu lra i!
an mangayaw i, alamo lra i!
S.TRANSL: 那你大獵祭(年底祭儀)的時候來吧！
Then come during our The hunting festival!

S.FORM: aiwa i! kiyalrimana ku!
aiwa i! kiyalrimana ko!
S.TRANSL: Alright! I’m looking forward to it!

S.FORM: kiyumalra ku driya, daw muasalr yu muruma i drekalr?
kiyomalra ko driya, daw moasalr yo moroma i drekalr?
S.TRANSL: 請問你為甚麼要搬回部落生活？
May I ask why you decided to move back to the tribe?

S.FORM: uwaruma ku patakesi.
owaroma ko patakesi.
S.TRANSL: I want to return to teach at the local school.

S.FORM: daw adri yu kadru i sinki patakesi?
daw adri yo kadro i sinki patakesi?
S.TRANSL: Why not teach in the city?

S.FORM: masupeng ku i kadrekalran. aw maranger ku pasuba dra drekalr.
masopeng ko i kadrekalran. aw maranger ko pasoba dra drekalr.
S.TRANSL: 因為我懷念我的故鄉，也希望能回饋部落。
Because I miss my hometown and I also want to give back to the tribe.

S.FORM: saigu yu temenun. i manay na paladam kanu?
saigo yo temenon. i manay na paladam kano?
S.TRANSL: 你很會織布，是誰教你的？
You’re very skilled at weaving, who taught you?

S.FORM: i mulri na babayan na paladam. i mulri na babayan i, amau na marasaiguigu temenun kaniyam drekalr.
i molri na babayan na paladam. i molri na babayan i, amao na marasaigoigo temenon kaniyam drekalr.
S.TRANSL: 是我的奶奶教的，奶奶是我們部落最會織布的人。
It was my grandmother, she is the most skilled weaver in our tribe.

S.FORM: daw maranger yu meladaladam temenun?
daw maranger yo meladaladam temenon?
S.TRANSL: How did you develop an interest in learning weaving?

S.FORM: naniyam kakuwayanan na temenun. maranger ku tremungutrungulr dra kakuwayanan.
naniyam kakowayanan na temenon. maranger ko tremongotrongolr dra kakowayanan.
S.TRANSL: 織布是我們的文化，我想要讓文化延續。
Weaving is a part of our culture, and I want to ensure its continuity.

S.FORM: salaw dalreu an tremekel ta kandri na dinuliyan i!
salaw dalreo an tremekel ta kandri na dinoliyan i!
kuyku na temueraw!
koyko na temoeraw!
saigu yu i! paetreng an temueraw ta dar?
saigo yo i! paetreng an temoeraw ta dar?
S.TRANSL: 你真厲害！這要釀很久嗎？
You’re really talented. Does it take a long time to make?

S.FORM: adri, kararuwa dra saliyusan. maruwa ta lra emabak dra dalilr tremekel. ta tauraw driya demeru na drinereman na driketran. an maderu lra ta palritekay na bineraberas. amerasay dra saima dra enay aw paredraulaw dra pikkak. abakaw kana gulrigulriyan aw retraanay kana mubekebek.

adri, kararowa dra saliyosan. marowa ta lra emabak dra dalilr tremekel. ta taoraw driya demero na drinereman na driketran. an madero lra ta palritekay na bineraberas. amerasay dra saima dra enay aw paredraolaw dra pikkak. abakaw kana golrigolriyan aw retraanay kana mobekebek.
S.TRANSL: 不用，大約一周就可以裝瓶喝了呢！把浸泡過的糯米蒸熟後放冷，撒下少許的冷開水將糯米飯攪和開來，再加入酒麴攪拌均勻後裝入甕裡，然後靜置在隱密不通風的地方。

No, it only takes about a week. Steam the soaked glutinous rice and let it cool. Sprinkle a little cold water over the rice to mix it up, then add the koji (rice malt) to the rice, stir it well, and pack it into an urn.

S.FORM: menaniwan yu dra manamanay?
menaniwan yo dra manamanay?
ulraya a kamangulr aw a lugiw kadrini. nanku sinalem peniya a!
olraya a kamangolr aw a logiw kadrini. nanko sinalem peniya a!
S.TRANSL: 我這裡有辣椒和蕗蕎，都是我自己種的喔！
I have chili and lokiy, both grown by myself!

S.FORM: trimaay a temaradruwa i, munuma paisu?
trimaay a temaradrowa i, monoma paiso?
mukasakasa i, druwaya leman miasma dra makalruwatr paisu.
mokasakasa i, drowaya leman miasma dra makalrowatr paiso.
sagar ku kandri na kiruwan. munuma paisu?
sagar ko kandri na kirowan. monoma paiso?
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡這件衣服，多少錢？
I like this piece of clothing. How much is it?

S.FORM: lruwatra leman paisu idri.
lrowatra leman paiso idri.
padrangal lra dradru. legetru driya dra saima i?
padrangal lra dradro. legetro driya dra saima i?
S.TRANSL: It’s too expensive. Can’t you lower the price a bit?

S.FORM: adri karuwa. an ta legetray i, kasasipun ku.
adri karowa. an ta legetray i, kasasipon ko.
S.TRANSL: No, if I lower it further, I’ll lose money.

S.FORM: kuwadruyaw lra i! tratrima ku dra udreudrem dra kiruwan dra saya.
kowadroyaw lra i! tratrima ko dra odreodrem dra kirowan dra saya.
S.TRANSL: 好吧！那我要一件黑色的衣服。
Alright then, I’ll take a black piece of clothing.

S.FORM: tratrima ku kandri na kamutr aw kandri na bulrawan.
tratrima ko kandri na kamotr aw kandri na bolrawan.
S.TRANSL: 我要這把刀和這個鍋子。
I want this knife and this pot.

S.FORM: mukasakasa i, druwaya kudrulr paisu. amau ku nilimayan demaway nadri. kapaaetreng an pamanay yu.
mokasakasa i, drowaya kodrolr paiso. amao ko nilimayan demaway nadri. kapaaetreng an pamanay yo.
S.TRANSL: 總共2000元，這是我自己手工打造的，保證可以用很久。
It’s a total of 2000 dollars. I handmade these, and they are guaranteed to last a long time.

S.FORM: ti pakalradramay ku anaanayan druwa tremimaa. karuwa kemadulu driya?
ti pakalradramay ko anaanayan drowa tremimaa. karowa kemadolo driya?
S.TRANSL: 我介紹朋友來買，可以再便宜一些嗎？
I’ll introduce my friend to buy. Can you give a further discount?

S.FORM: aiwa i! ta legetray dra saima.
aiwa i! ta legetray dra saima.
S.TRANSL: Alright! I’ll give you a 20% discount.

S.FORM: alamu nau a! menaniwan ku dra kiruwaruwan lra, dra kabukabung lra.
alamo nao a! menaniwan ko dra kirowarowan lra, dra kabokabong lra.
S.TRANSL: 來看看喔！衣服帽子都有賣。
Come and take a look! We sell clothes and hats.

S.FORM: kiyumalra ku driya, na kiruwan i, munuma paisu?
kiyomalra ko driya, na kirowan i, monoma paiso?
na saya i, tuluwa leman miasma dra makalruwatr paisu. an tuluwa i, sakudrulr paisu.
na saya i, tolowa leman miasma dra makalrowatr paiso. an tolowa i, sakodrolr paiso.
S.TRANSL: One piece of clothing is 350 dollars, three pieces for 1000 dollars.

S.FORM: tratrima ku dra saya dra kiruwan. berayi ku kana bekalan.
tratrima ko dra saya dra kirowan. berayi ko kana bekalan.
S.TRANSL: 我買一件就好，請給我新的。
I’ll just buy one piece, please give me a new one.

S.FORM: inabayan! maranger ku tremima dra bineraberas aw na patraka na tinenger dra makaw.
inabayan! maranger ko tremima dra bineraberas aw na patraka na tinenger dra makaw.
S.TRANSL: 你好，我想要買糯米飯和山胡椒滷肉。
Hello, I would like to buy sticky rice and braised pork with maqaw pepper.

S.FORM: uniyan lra na bineraberas. ulraya na pinadrelretr dra tana. tratrima yu?
oniyan lra na bineraberas. olraya na pinadrelretr dra tana. tratrima yo?
S.TRANSL: 糯米飯賣完了。我還有刺蔥油餅，你要買嗎？
The rice is sold out. I have tana pancakes, would you like to buy them?

S.FORM: aiwa i! berayi ku dra saya. an masalr lra i, druwa ku lra tremimaa dra bineraberas.
aiwa i! berayi ko dra saya. an masalr lra i, drowa ko lra tremimaa dra bineraberas.
S.TRANSL: 好吧！請給我一份，我下次再來買糯米飯。
Alright, please give me one. I’ll come back next time to buy rice.

S.FORM: aiwa, ti abakaw driya dra abakan. kemadri i, makalruwatr paisu.
aiwa, ti abakaw driya dra abakan. kemadri i, makalrowatr paiso.
S.TRANSL: W：好，我幫你用袋子裝起來，這樣50元。
Okay, I’ll pack it in a bag for you. That’ll be 50 dollars.
